description: This Java class defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic system endpoints such as a welcome message, redirect to Swagger UI, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic system endpoints for health, info, and Swagger UI redirect within a Spring Boot application.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects incoming requests to the Swagger UI page, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple string indicating application health.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
